column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday October 29 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75N at 97 MM in Madison Co:
column4: At least one lane is blocked due to a semi that went off the roadway.

column3: I-75N at 97 MM in Madison Co:
column4: Crews are in the process of removing the semi and cleaning up a fuel spill.

column3: I-75N at 97 MM in Madison Co:
column4: Traffic is backed up to Exit 95.
The ferry is closed until further notice due to high water conditions.
